body:
Hey everyone!
I'm back from my time off and ready to become an Avicus Jr Mod again!
So, go ahead and ask me anything :)
body_tagged:
Hey everyone!
I'm back from my time off and ready to become an Avicus Jr Mod again!
So, go ahead and ask me anything :)
title: Back from the Dead!!! (AMA)

replies.body:
Welcome back!!
What made you apply for Jr Mod? 
I thought you got demoted before :/
replies.body_tagged:
Welcome back!!
What made you apply for Jr Mod? 
I thought you got demoted before :/

replies.body:
Thanks
i want to contribute to making Avicus the best server ever
i wasn't demoted, I just had to take some leave because there were some issues IRL and I needed a break

replies.body:
Hi! Welcome back. Question time :)

Me for admin?
Admin for me?
Would you rather eat a cat or let a cat eat you?
Why is Donld Trumps hair so beutiful and elegant?
Mozart or Skrillex?
Tigers or Tiger shark?
Do you think aliens/ghosts are real?
Favorite movie?
